org.primaresearch.cmd

Class ExternalProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.cmd.ExternalProcess

  • public class ExternalProcess
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for running an external command line tool.
    Version:
    2 (changed from command line string to string array)
    Author:
    clc

      • ExternalProcess

        public ExternalProcess(java.lang.String[] commandLine,
               java.lang.String executionDirectory)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        commandLine - - Command line call including executable and arguments
        executionDirectory - - Working directory for the external process (use null for current working directory)

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public boolean run()
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Starts the external process.
        Returns:
        true if the process returned with exit code 0, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • run

        public boolean run(int timeout)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Starts the external process.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in seconds (0 for infinite time)
        Returns:
        true if the process returned with exit code 0, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
